entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
